question: India and this country planned to strengthen practical cooperation to prevent misuse of info & communication technologies to fight against its use in criminal & terrorist activities.
explanation: India & Russia have decided to strengthen practical cooperation to prevent misuse of info & communication technologies to fight against its use in criminal & terrorist activities. To prevent possibilities of conflict appropriate mechanism for ensuring security in use of ICT should be put in place. Both sides reiterated the intention to strengthen cooperation in info sharing & capacity building.
